facts: Once April hits, the penguins start off on their famous march to their breeding grounds.
While other birds have wings for flying, penguins have adapted flippers to help them swim in the water.
There are no penguins in the North Pole.
Emperor Penguins can stay underwater for around 20 minutes at a time.
Some penguins live in warmer climates.
The Galapagos Penguin is the only species of Penguin north of the equator.
